statements: UPDATE notifications SET notification_text = 'New notification text' WHERE notification_id = 'd67b4ef1-529f-4868-86f3-761e5b62c623';
UPDATE notifications SET is_read = TRUE, notification_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = '47ee2c84-3bc6-4f3d-8b2e-d0d42fe45db4';
UPDATE notifications SET notification_text = 'New Message', is_read = TRUE WHERE notification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE notifications SET notification_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', user_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-5e6f-0123456789ab' WHERE notification_id = 'fedcba98-7654-3210-feba-dc9876543210';
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Alert updated', alert_type = 'Update' WHERE alert_id = 2;
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New Message' WHERE user_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE alerts SET alert_message = 'Alert Updated', created_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = 202 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
UPDATE file_notifications SET notification_type = 'Email' WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE user_subscriptions SET subscription_status = 'Active' WHERE subscription_id = 3;
UPDATE file_notifications SET file_name = 'updated_file.txt', user_id = 101, timestamp = NOW() WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE user_subscriptions SET subscription_type = 'monthly', subscription_status = 'active' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE Notifications SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Files SET file_size = 1024 WHERE file_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Notifications SET message = 'New message' WHERE notification_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Files SET file_size = 1024, upload_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE file_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-1234567890ab';
UPDATE notifications SET message='New message for user', timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE notification_id=1;
UPDATE files SET file_size=5000, created_at='2022-10-15 10:45:00' WHERE file_id=3;
UPDATE notifications SET message = 'New message', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
